name: LoveNotes
0:
”Alexa, open Love Notes”
”Alexa, ask Love Notes to write a note for Michelle”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: love notes
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Brighten your partner's day by leaving them personal love notes in Alexa to remind them how much you care. Just open Love Notes and leave a custom note for your partner. When they open Love Notes later, they'll get your note (and they can leave you one too!).

HOW TO USE THIS SKILL
Just ask Alexa to open Love Notes and she'll let you know if there are any unread love notes for you or your partner. You can listen to any unread notes and also leave new ones.

If Alexa got your or your partner's name wrong (hey, it happens sometimes) just say "Alexa, tell Love Notes my name is <name>". She'll fix it and ask you to confirm your partner's name as well.

SHARE THE LOVE
Love Notes is part of Next Level Living's mission to help everyone live happier and more meaningful lives. We're actively supporting this skill and would love to hear from you. Please email kevin@nxtll.com with any feedback or feature requests, and, if you're enjoying Love Notes, please do leave us a review.
